relation: Great for these types of students
housewives, single moms, students that need to work full time, students unable to follow a school's traditional curriculum, students who were unable to complete nursing programs, lpns, nas.
i have been registered in an independent study based program (nursing associtates), so i have been studying at my own pace, therefore did not experience heavy academic rigor.

research the school and see if it works for you, your schedule and future plans. very importantly, is to make sure you are a person who can work independently without a class time schedule and are very disciplined to create and follow your own schedule/itinerary in order to complete the required work and exams.
as it is a distance learning/online school, it is very convenient. you can do school work in certain programs and courses at your own pace.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Janet from Lincoln, NE 03/20/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 20 Categories Comments Campus Safety I am an online student. I'm sure the security is good. I have not heard anything negative. Clubs and Activities There are a few activities offered to online students. I'm sure the activities that are on campus are good, fun, exciting and relaxing. Great for these types of students This college meets the needs of people from all different economic, social and religious backgrounds. That's one reason reason it is an exceptional institution. Bang for the buck I think you can get a quality education from Excelsior without the astronomical expense. Online education is the wave of this era now.
